text: Dynasty is a studio album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on May 23, 1979. == Track listing == *I Was Made For Lovin' You *2,000 Man *Sure Know Something *Dirty Livin' *Charisma *Magic Touch *Hard Times *X-Ray Eyes *Save Your Love Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1979 albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Disco albums
title: Dynasty (album)
